modName: New file path for elder race female
summary: just a small mod that just gives the elder race females a custom folder setup for placing meshes that are to be used only by elder race females.
descriptionHtml:
This is for those of you who are finding that old folks wearing the same skimpy gear as their more youthful counter parts is a bit too confronting, this may be of help to you.

A while back when I tried the "touched by Dibella" body I immediately saw that the elders had uvw related problem with this mod so I took a glance through the creation kit to see how I might be able to fix it.

I was hoping to find the elder race body texture and update it but could not find it in any of the bsa files and not long after that I learned that those texture had apparently been packaged into the skyrim exe file.

After that I reasoned that the only remaining solution was for the meshes used in outfits worn elder race females be placed into their own folder structure in a different location from the default female meshes.

Going through the creation kit to find out what outfits the elder race females are wearing I then extracted the relevant vanilla meshes from the bsa (their aren't many)  and put them in their own file path.

I used the creation kits "armor add-on" window for those outfits, and made it so that only the elder race female use the new file path for those meshes

The reason I haven't posted it anywhere before now is because skyrim does (for some reason) indeed take a too long to load when I was testing it but it does load, so I finally decided to post it as is primarily as a back up.

Truthfully do not know how resolve the problem with the loading time, hopefully those who are more experienced and confidant with the creation kit than I am will not mind taking a look at it and hopefully solve the loading time problem and be kind enough to inform me what i did wrong.

Update just tested this with minmal number of mods as opposed to running over 200 mods and it loads faster but still not as fast as it should.

The meshes used in this mod are the default/vanilla meshes extracted from the "skyrim - meshes.bsa" so it should be "safe for work" and can easily be replaced with those that fit match your body replacement mod of choice.

The tools I used are;
Creation Kit
BSA Browser
Tes5Edit (purely to clean the esp)
author: inkwhiz888
